      {Filter} -- pixelfilter instance with information

      {Sampler} -- sampler instance with information

      {Accelerator} -- accelerator instance with information

   .. attribute:: integrator

      {Integrator} -- integrator instance with information

   .. attribute:: camera

      {Camera} -- camera instance with information

   .. attribute:: lookAt

      {LookAt} -- look at instance with eye, point and up vector
